get.summary: Return a user for national id

parameters.name: department
parameters.description: Department slug to get categories for.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: String to search for in types.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the case to get.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: String to search for in cases.

parameters.name: caseNumber
parameters.description: Case number to filter on, takes into account `caseNumber` on `Case`.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Case status id to filter cases on, takes into account `status` on `Case`.

parameters.name: employeeId
parameters.description: Id of the employee to filter cases on, takes into account `employeeId` on `Case` and `CaseComment`.

parameters.name: published
parameters.description: Boolean to filter cases on, takes into account `published` on `Case`.

parameters.name: fastTrack
parameters.description: Boolean to filter cases on, takes into account `fastTrack` on `Case`.

parameters.name: institution
parameters.description: Institution to filter cases on, takes into account `institution` on `Case`.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Date from which to filter adverts on, inclusive, takes into account `createdDate`, `updatedDate` and `signatureDate`.

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: Date to which to filter adverts on, inclusive, takes into account `createdDate`, `updatedDate` and `signatureDate`.

parameters.name: department
parameters.description: Department slug to filter cases on, takes into account `department` on `Advert`.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type slug to filter cases on, takes into account `type` on `Advert`.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category slug to filter cases on, takes into account `category` on `Advert`.

info.title: The Official Journal of Iceland Admin API
info.description: Admin api for the Official Journal of Iceland. This API is used to manage the content of the Official Journal of Iceland.

id.description: Unique ID for the advert department, GUID format.

slug.description: Slug of the advert department, used in URLs and API requests.

id.description: The id of the communication status

title.description: The title of the communication status

slug.description: The slug of the communication status

id.description: Unique ID for the case tag
Unique ID for the advert type, GUID format.

title.description: Title of the advert type, always uppercased.

slug.description: Slug of the advert type, used in URLs and API requests.

department.description: Department the advert type belongs to.

id.description: Unique ID for the main category, GUID format.

slug.description: Slug of the main category, used in URLs and API requests.

description.description: Description of the main category, used on front page.
description.example: Hæstiréttur, lögmenn, lögreglumál, dómsmál og landsdómur.

id.description: Unique ID for the advert category, GUID format.

slug.description: Slug of the advert category, used in URLs and API requests.

mainCategory.description: The main category this category belongs to.

id.description: Unique ID for the institution, GUID format.

slug.description: Slug of the institution, used in URLs and API requests.

id.description: Unique ID for the user, GUID format.

CaseCommentDirection.description: Was the comment sent or received.

caseStatus.description: Case status of when the comment was created.

age.description: String representation of the age of the case comment.

ageIso.description: ISO date format representation of the age of the case comment.

id.description: The id of the signature type

title.description: The title of the signature type

slug.description: The slug of the signature type

text.description: The name/title/w.e. of the signature member

textAbove.description: The text comes above the signature name

textBefore.description: The text that comes before the signature name

textBelow.description: The text that comes below the signature name

textAfter.description: The text that comes after the signature name

involvedParty.description: The involved party of the signature

applicationId.description: Id of the submitted application, default to null on older cases.

caseNumber.description: Case number (numeric string) gets generated automatically when a case is created.

status.description: Status of the case, default to "Innsent"

tag.description: Internal tag for the case, default to null

createdAt.description: Date the case was created. ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.

modifiedAt.description: Date when the case was last updated. ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.

assignedTo.description: User the case is assigned to.

communicationStatus.description: Status of communication with the applicant, default to `CaseCommunicationStatus.NotStarted`

publishedAt.description: Date the case was published. ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.

requestedPublicationDate.description: Requested advert publication date. ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.

task.title: gerir athugasemd
task.comment: Pálína, getur þú tekið við og staðfest að upplýsingarnar séu réttar?

caseIds.description: Id of the case to publish.

comment.description: The comment that was found or null.

storeState.description: Store the state of the application

institution.description: The name of the institution responsible for the signature

date.description: Date when the institution signed the signature

involvedPartyId.description: The id of the involved party

caseId.description: The case id of the signature

advertId.description: The advert id of the signature
